hero.title: Embark on a Medieval Adventure
hero.subtitle: Enter the Lands of the Lion, a medieval festival where every visitor becomes a hero and every step advances the adventure.

intro.title: The Kingdom Awaits You
intro.text_1: Enter a world where history breathes and legends come to life. Our kingdom offers more than just events; it offers a passage through time.
intro.text_2: From the grandest tournaments to the quietest village gatherings, every moment is designed to immerse you in the rich tapestry of our medieval heritage.

features.title: Explore the Medieval Era
features.subtitle: Dive into history with our complete features

paragraphs.1: Welcome to the Lands of the Lion, a unique medieval event inspired by live-action role-playing. Designed to offer total immersion, the festival plunges you into a world of quests and ancestral craftsmanship.
paragraphs.2: Organized around a vast thematic village, each district invites you to meet passionate artisans, melodious troubadours, welcoming innkeepers, and inspired creators who bring to life an authentic universe, faithful to the secular traditions of the region.
paragraphs.3: Thanks to an enriched interactive experience with quests via QR codes, craft workshop reservations, click & collect at the shop, medieval riddles, and creation galleries, every visitor becomes the hero of their own epic.
paragraphs.4: Your digital grimoire guides you in exploration, learning, and progression throughout the journey to the castle, where your personal epic reaches its climax.
paragraphs.5: The Lands of the Lion is where immersion meets innovation, where heritage inspires play, and where every visit forges a new legend.

discover.title: Interactive Maps
discover.description: Navigate through a detailed interactive map of our medieval village. Spot the locations of artisans, workshops, taverns, and key points of interest to optimize your exploration and miss none of the wonders of the Lands of the Lion.

events.title: Historical Timelines
events.description: Discover the milestone events that shaped the medieval period. Each timeline is a window into the past, enriching your understanding of the world we recreate and offering valuable context for your adventures within the Lands of the Lion.

community.title: Join the Explorers
community.description: Join a community of history enthusiasts and medieval reenactment fans
